M

main - package main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.Main
Main method Entry Point into the Island Trader Game Initializing all the objects needed for a game Most of the functionality is handled by Main's other methods`
Main - Class in main
The entry point to the program, creates instances of the classes required to start the game, then handles control to the c lass for the desired ui.
Main() - Constructor for class main.Main
 
MakePaymentsDialog - Class in uiClasses.gui
Dialog for making payments before traveling on a Route to another Island
MakePaymentsDialog(GameEnvironment, Route, ChooseRouteScreen) - Constructor for class uiClasses.gui.MakePaymentsDialog
Creates the JDialog box and calls the methods required to add components.
minMoneyRequired() - Method in class coreClasses.GameEnvironment
Calculates the amount that needs to be paid before the cheapest route available can be sailed.
moneyBalanceToString() - Method in class coreClasses.Player
Method to convert a Players money balance into a String representation
